rpgEncounter.title: Toilet Issues
rpgEncounter.action:
As you are walking through the corridors of Hogwards second floor, a young boy darts out of the bathrooms and bumps into you at full speed. You prepare to start a rant, but before seeing his face he is already running in the other direction.
 **1. Chase that little...**
**2.Check the bathroom he came from.**
**3.I was like that on my first year.** ***Walks away.***

option1.successMessage: You are getting too old for this, as soon as you catch up to the child, you hear a loud explosion coming from the bathroom, the entire place covered in filth. The boy spends the rest of the day cleaning the room, he seems genuinely sorry after the work and even shares with you some treats from his bag.
option1.failMessage: The little brat is almost at your grasp when you slip on a puddle in the corridor floor and fall, right after his escape you discover what the prank was, the whole bathroom filled with an unbearable smell. ***I wonder where a first year learnt aquamenti***

option2.successMessage: As you enter the room you spot what seems like a particularly big dungbomb on the floor. Luckily you managed to get rid of the thing before it activated. You are rewarded with a bonus that month, for saving that bathroom from a most disreputable end.
option2.failMessage: As you enter the toilet your feet stumbles into something, next thing you know you are in a bed at the Hogwarts hospital wing. Some students have found you feinted in the smelly bathroom after stumbling over a dungbomb. The stink still sticks to you.

option3.successMessage: While you walk away you hear a loud sound, it seems the boy had planted a dungbomb on the bathroom. ***I pity the one who will have to clean this mess***.
option3.failMessage: While preparing to walk away, you notice the boy has stained your clothes with dirt, you decide to clean it in the bathroom, but as soon as the door opens an extremely stinky smoke hits your nostrils. You walk away coughing and realize that child had placed a dungbomb in the toilet.

rpgEncounter.title: Mystery Potion
rpgEncounter.action:
While only half paying attention in potions class you startle your self to attention and realize you've been following the wrong instructions. You glance down at your cauldron. It's glowing a fierce shade of pink and the fragrance it emits is simply amazing you feel it needs something extra you reach over and grab... **
1. Alihotsy 
2. Chicken Lips 
3. Newt spleen**

option1.successMessage: You add Alihotsy to your potion you feel nervous when your potions teacher approaches you they dip their flask into your potion and begin to taste it after a short second your teacher bursts out laughing it turns out you made a laughing potion. You take some for yourself.
option1.failMessage: You put Alihotsy in the potion and the aroma of the potion changes it smells horrid. Your potions teacher approaches you and begins to taste your potion they spit it out immediatly and pimples start forming all over their body They take 10 points away from your house for being so inattentive as they leave the classroom screaming your name!

option2.successMessage: You see your potion teacher starting to head in your direction you quickly throw chicken lips into your cauldron. Your teacher finally reaches you and tastes your potion  a weird mist decsending around them apart from the eeriness of the mist around your teacher they reply with splended job and you recieve full makrs for your potion although it's effects are still unkown to you.
option2.failMessage: Your teacher finally gets to you and your added chicken lips seem to do the trick they enjoyed your potion until... their mouth starts turning into a bird beak and they no longer tak in english they scream *BAUWK BAUWKKKKK* at you as you leave the classroom from embarrisment.

option3.successMessage: When your potion teacher finally gets to you, you say a little prayer in the hopes it changes the outcome of whatever you have just made. Your teacher reaches their flask in and tastes your potion after a small explosion they appear younger they pat your shoulder seeming delighted but tell you that you made the wrong potion you were meant to make a dragon tonic not a temporary aging potion.
option3.failMessage: You put newt spleen into your potion and you teacher stops in their tracks... *I can't taste that it smells horrible what is even in this?* after some testing your teacher tells you that you made a hate potion they express their disgust towards your negligence and ask you to do better in future classes.
